name: International Conference on Gender Studies: “Gender and Intersectionality”
content: The conference seeks to explore the past and current status of gender identity around the world, to examine the ways in which society is shaped by gender and to situate gender in relation to the full scope of human affairs. The conference is addressed to academics, researchers and professionals with a particular interest related to the conference topic. We invite proposals from various disciplines including history, sociology, political studies, anthropology, culture studies and literature. Proposals up to 250 words should be sent by 10 May 2021 to: genderstudies@lcir.co.uk. Download Paper proposal form. Registration fee – 90 GBP
